data.title: Mass Communication
data.text:
Hostel and Mess

THE TOP REASONS TO LIVE ON CAMPUS

Choosing to live on campus can ease the transition to college life. Living on campus means you will be more plugged-in to the campus community and have more opportunities to join clubs, attend campus events, meet new people and develop friendships.

Living on campus provides students with a unique living experience. Here are our Top Ten reasons to live on campus!

Live Smart. Research shows that students who live on campus have higher CGPAs.

Live Close. Roll out of bed and get to class in 5 minutes! You are right next to the library, dining halls & other academic blocks.

Live Wireless. Students who live on campus have access to computer labs and high- speed wireless connectivity.

Live Secure. Doon Business School Group makes the safety of its residents a top priority.

Live in a Community. Students who live on campus interact with students from other states and countries. Friendships formed during college last a lifetime.

Leadership opportunities. By living on campus, students are more likely to get involved in student organizations, leadership skills that look great on a resume.

Live Cheaper. The cost of living on campus is less than living off campus. Campus housing includes not only the cost of your room, high speed internet and 24-hour security.

Live Connected. Campus residents have a stronger connection to the campus community. Because they are living in the center of all the action.

Live Fun! Living in the residence halls is a fun experience. Social and educational activities are available for residents to enjoy.

Live DBS! Experience the complete package of college life at DBS by showing your Herd pride. Make memories and friendships that will last a lifetime.

In order to facilitate the stay of outstation students, the institute offers limited residences facilities. A home away from the home for the students. The institute provides a room with an attached bathroom / separate to the students with separate areas of residence for Males and Females. Seven well-furnished and aesthetically designed residences have been constructed with a view to provide best possible facilities to the students.

• 03 BOYS RESIDENCY • 04 GIRLS RESIDENCY • STAFF RESIDENCE

Wi-Fi enabled residencys

24X7 Hot water facility

Laundry Facility

ATM counter at campus

Sports Arena

The mess of the institute is spacious and equipped with comfortable dining furniture. It provides hygienic and nutritious food to the students. The students decide the weekly menu according to which meals are prepared and served. Mess staff is conscious about the cleanliness and quality of food in a hygienic manner.

Indra Nooyi Residency (Formerly known as Girls New Residency)

Indra Nooyi Girls Residency has good accommodation for the living of girl students. It is situated inside the campus. It can house 60 students.

Room Types:

Double Seater with Attached Washroom without Balcony

Two Seater with attached washroom + Balcony

Front View

Two Seater with attached washroom

Two Seater with attached washroom

Two Seater with attached washroom + Balcony

Facilities at Indra Nooyi Girls Residency:

RO purified water for drinking is there at every floors

Hot water available

Wi-Fi facility is available in the whole campus

Students will have access to the well - equipped gym

Electrical Backup

The security of the residents is one of the Institution highest priorities. Access into Indira Nooyi residency is via the use of a Biometric system only. Security personnel are stationed at the residency to ensure round the clock security for the residents and CCTV Surveillance

Central Girls Mess facilities is available at the campus

Satya Residency

Satya Boys Residency has a capacity of 150 students with state-of-art facilities for accommodation, recreation, sports facilities such as Badminton, gym, sick room, reading room and a great mess. Satya Residency is near to market the distance from campus is 2 Km.
